verses.verse: For <S%G444>men<s%> shall be <S%G5367>lovers<s%> of their own <S%G5367>selves,<s%> <S%G5366>covetous,<s%> <S%G213>boasters,<s%> <S%G5244>proud,<s%> <S%G989>blasphemers,<s%> <S%G545>disobedient<s%> to <S%G1118>parents,<s%> <S%G884>unthankful,<s%> <S%G462>unholy,<s%>

<S%G794>Without<s%> natural <S%G794>affection,<s%> truce <S%G786>breakers,<s%> <S%G1228>false<s%> <S%G1228>accusers,<s%> <S%G193>incontinent,<s%> <S%G434>fierce,<s%> <S%G865>despisers<s%> of those that are <S%G865>good,<s%>

For of <S%G5130>this<s%> sort are they which <S%G1744>creep<s%> <S%G1519><s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> <S%G3614>houses,<s%> and <S%G162>lead<s%> <S%G162>captive<s%> <S%G1133>silly<s%> <S%G1133>women<s%> <S%G4987>laden<s%> with <S%G266>sins,<s%> <S%G71>led<s%> away with <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G1939>lusts,<s%>
<S%G3842>Ever<s%> <S%G3129>learning,<s%> and <S%G3368>never<s%> <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G2064>come<s%> to the <S%G1922>knowledge<s%> of the <S%G225>truth.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> as <S%G2389>Jannes<s%> and <S%G2387>Jambres<s%> <S%G436>withstood<s%> <S%G3475>Moses,<s%> <S%G3779>so<s%> do <S%G3778>these<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G436>resist<s%> the <S%G225>truth:<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> of <S%G2704>corrupt<s%> <S%G3563>minds,<s%> <S%G96>reprobate<s%> <S%G4012>concerning<s%> the <S%G4102>faith.<s%>

But they shall <S%G4298>proceed<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G1909>further:<s%> <S%G4118><s%> for their <S%G454>folly<s%> shall be <S%G1552>manifest<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men, as <S%G3588>their's<s%> <S%G1565><s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> was.

<S%G1375>Persecutions,<s%> <S%G3804>afflictions,<s%> <S%G3634>which<s%> <S%G1096>came<s%> to me <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G490>Antioch,<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G2430>Iconium,<s%> <S%G1722>at<s%> <S%G3082>Lystra;<s%> <S%G3634>what<s%> <S%G1375>persecutions<s%> I <S%G5297>endured:<s%> but out of them <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G4506>delivered<s%> me.
But <S%G4190>evil<s%> <S%G444>men<s%> and <S%G1114>seducers<s%> shall <S%G4298>wax<s%> <S%G5501>worse<s%> and <S%G5501>worse,<s%> <S%G4105>deceiving,<s%> and being <S%G4105>deceived.<s%>

But <S%G3306>continue<s%> you in the things <S%G3739>which<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned<s%> and have been <S%G4104>assured<s%> of, <S%G1492>knowing<s%> of <S%G5101>whom<s%> you have <S%G3129>learned<s%> them;

And that from a <S%G1025>child<s%> you have <S%G1492>known<s%> the <S%G2413>holy<s%> <S%G1121>scriptures,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4679>make<s%> you <S%G4679>wise<s%> to <S%G4991>salvation<s%> <S%G1223>through<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus.<s%>

<S%G3956>All<s%> <S%G1124>scripture<s%> is given by <S%G2315>inspiration<s%> of <S%G2315>God,<s%> and is <S%G5624>profitable<s%> for <S%G1319>doctrine,<s%> for <S%G1650>reproof,<s%> for <S%G1882>correction,<s%> for <S%G3809>instruction<s%> in <S%G1343>righteousness:<s%>
That the <S%G444>man<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> may be <S%G739>perfect,<s%> <S%G1822>thoroughly<s%> <S%G1822>furnished<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G2041>works.<s%>
